00008 template<class SequenceType, class ValueType>
00009 void
00010 removeFromSequence( SequenceType &sequence, 
00011                     const ValueType &valueToRemove )
00012 {
00013    for ( unsigned int index =0; index < sequence.size(); ++index )
00014    {
00015       if ( sequence[ index ] == valueToRemove )
00016          sequence.erase( sequence.begin() + index );
00017    }
00018 }
